alert.note: Alert for Elko (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 24 at 2:01PM PDT until May 24 at 2:30PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: The National Weather Service in Elko Nevada has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southern Elko County in northeastern Nevada... * Until 230 PM PDT. * At 200 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 10 miles northwest of Ruby Valley, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Elko County, including the following locations... Secret Pass and Halleck. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
